name: Healthyfied Cajun Shrimp
description: Dive into the essence of Louisiana with this Healthified Cajun Shrimp recipe. Perfect for anyone following a low-carb, low-sugar diet, yet not compromising on flavor. Rich in spices and packed with vibrant mixed vegetables, this dish brings a nutritious twist to your table while catering to a health-conscious lifestyle.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your vegetables by rinsing the mixed vegetables under cold water to thaw.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and devein the shrimp, ensuring they're ready for cooking.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the tomato ketchup, salt, ground black pepper, basil, and Cajun seasoning. Stir until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the shrimp to the bowl and toss them in the seasoning mix until they are evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat. Once hot, add the seasoned shrimp. Cook for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mixed vegetables to the skillet with the shrimp. Cook for an additional 5-7 minutes until the shrimp are pink and fully cooked and the vegetables are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
